title: Quantum State Component
description: Manages the quantum properties of an entity, including its superposition and entanglement.

density_matrix.description: The quantum density matrix representing the entity's superposition of states.

coherence_score.description: The purity of the quantum state (0.0 = maximally mixed, 1.0 = pure).

entanglement_network.description: A map of entangled entity IDs to their entanglement strength.
